verses.verse: Sons <S%G5043><s%>, obey <S%G5219><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> parents <S%G1118><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> right <S%G1342><s%>.

Honor <S%G5091><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%>; (which <S%G3748><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the first <S%G4413><s%> commandment <S%G1785><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> promise <S%G1860><s%>;)
That <S%G2443><s%> it may be <S%G1096><s%> well <S%G2095><s%> with you <S%G4671><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> you may <S%G2071><s%> live long <S%G3118><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%>, you <S%G3588><s%> fathers <S%G3962><s%>, provoke <S%G3949><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> sons <S%G5043><s%> to wrath <S%G3949><s%>: but <S%G235><s%> bring <S%G1625><s%> them <S%G846><s%> up <S%G1625><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the nurture <S%G3809><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> admonition <S%G3559><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%>.

Servants <S%G1401><s%>, be obedient to <S%G5219><s%> them that are <S%G3588><s%> your masters <S%G2962><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%>, with <S%G3326><s%> fear <S%G5401><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> trembling <S%G5156><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> singleness <S%G572><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> unto Christ <S%G5547><s%>;

Not <S%G3361><s%> with <S%G2596><s%> eyeservice <S%G3787><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> menpleasers <S%G441><s%>; but <S%G235><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> the servants <S%G1401><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%>, doing <S%G4160><s%> the will <S%G2307><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the heart <S%G5590><s%>;
With <S%G3326><s%> good will <S%G2133><s%> doing service <S%G1398><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> to the Lord <S%G2962><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> to men <S%G444><s%>:

Knowing <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> whatever <S%G1437><s%> <S%G99999><s%> good thing <S%G18><s%> <S%G99999><s%> any man <S%G1538><s%> does <S%G4160><s%>, the same <S%G5124><s%> shall he receive <S%G2865><s%> of <S%G3844><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%>, whether <S%G1535><s%> he be bond <S%G1401><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> free <S%G1658><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%>, you <S%G4160><s%> masters <S%G2962><s%>, do <S%G4160><s%> the same things <S%G846><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, desist <S%G447><s%> from threatening <S%G547><s%>: knowing <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> <S%G99999><s%> Master <S%G2962><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G2532><s%>; neither <S%G3756><s%> is there <S%G2076><s%> respect of persons <S%G4382><s%> with <S%G3844><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

Finally <S%G3063><s%>, my <S%G3450><s%> brothers <S%G80><s%>, be strong <S%G1743><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the power <S%G2904><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> might <S%G2479><s%>.

Put on <S%G1746><s%> the whole armor <S%G3833><s%> of God <S%G4314><s%>, that <S%G3588><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> may be able <S%G1410><s%> to stand <S%G2476><s%> against <S%G4314><s%> the wiles <S%G3180><s%> of the devil <S%G1228><s%>.

For <S%G3754><s%> we <S%G2254><s%> wrestle <S%G3823><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> <S%G99999><s%> against <S%G4314><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> blood <S%G129><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> against <S%G4314><s%> principalities <S%G746><s%>, against <S%G4314><s%> powers <S%G1849><s%>, against <S%G4314><s%> the rulers <S%G2888><s%> of the darkness <S%G4655><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> world <S%G165><s%>, against <S%G4314><s%> spiritual <S%G4152><s%> wickedness <S%G4189><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> high places <S%G2032><s%>.

Therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G99999><s%> take unto you <S%G353><s%> the whole armor <S%G3833><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> you may be able <S%G1410><s%> to withstand <S%G436><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the evil <S%G4190><s%> day <S%G2250><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> having done <S%G2716><s%> all <S%G537><s%>, to stand <S%G2476><s%>.

Stand <S%G2476><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%>, having <S%G4024><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> waist <S%G3751><s%> belted <S%G4024><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> truth <S%G225><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> having on <S%G1746><s%> the breastplate <S%G2382><s%> of righteousness <S%G1343><s%>;
And <S%G2532><s%> your feet <S%G4228><s%> shod <S%G5265><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> the preparation <S%G2091><s%> of the gospel <S%G2098><s%> of peace <S%G1515><s%>;

Above <S%G1909><s%> all <S%G3956><s%>, taking <S%G353><s%> the shield <S%G2375><s%> of faith <S%G4102><s%>, with which <S%G1722><s%> <S%G99999><s%> you shall be able <S%G1410><s%> to quench <S%G4570><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the fiery <S%G4448><s%> darts <S%G956><s%> of the wicked <S%G4190><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> take <S%G1209><s%> the helmet <S%G4030><s%> of salvation <S%G4992><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the sword <S%G3162><s%> of the Spirit <S%G4151><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the word <S%G4487><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>:

Praying <S%G4336><s%> always <S%G1722><s%> <S%G99999><s%> <S%G99999><s%> with <S%G1223><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> prayer <S%G4335><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> supplication <S%G1162><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> watching <S%G69><s%> there <S%G1519><s%> <S%G99999><s%> <S%G99999><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> perseverance <S%G4343><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> supplication <S%G1162><s%> for <S%G4012><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> saints <S%G40><s%>;

And <S%G2532><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> me <S%G1700><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> utterance <S%G3056><s%> may be given <S%G1325><s%> unto <S%G1722><s%> me <S%G3427><s%>, that I may open <S%G457><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> mouth <S%G4750><s%> <S%G99999><s%> boldly <S%G3954><s%>, to make known <S%G1107><s%> the mystery <S%G3466><s%> of the gospel <S%G2098><s%>,

For <S%G5228><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I am an ambassador <S%G4243><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> bonds <S%G254><s%>: that <S%G2443><s%> in it <S%G1722><s%> <S%G99999><s%> I may speak boldly <S%G3955><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> I <S%G3165><s%> ought <S%G1163><s%> to speak <S%G2980><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> you <S%G5210><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> may know <S%G1492><s%> my <S%G1691><s%> affairs <S%G2596><s%>, and how <S%G5101><s%> I do <S%G4238><s%>, Tychicus <S%G5190><s%>, a beloved <S%G27><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> faithful <S%G4103><s%> minister <S%G1249><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%>, shall make known <S%G1107><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%>:

Whom <S%G3739><s%> I have sent <S%G3992><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> <S%G99999><s%> that purpose <S%G5124><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> you might know <S%G1097><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> affairs <S%G4012><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> that he might comfort <S%G3870><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> hearts <S%G2588><s%>.

Peace <S%G1515><s%> be to the brothers <S%G80><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> love <S%G26><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%>, from <S%G575><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>.

Grace <S%G5485><s%> be with <S%G3326><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> them that <S%G3588><s%> love <S%G25><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> sincerity <S%G861><s%>. Amen. Written from Rome to the Ephesians by Tychicus.
